patches.content:
Index: 
===================================================================
--- 
+++ 
@@ -1,4 +1,5 @@
+// src/pages/HomePage.js
 import React from 'react';
 import { Link } from 'react-router-dom';
 import { Card, CardContent, Typography, CardActions, Button } from '@mui/material';
 import { companies } from '../data/sampleData';
@@ -12,10 +13,10 @@
       <Typography variant="body1" paragraph>
         Explore companies and their founders below.
       </Typography>
 
-      {companies.map((company) => (
-        <Card key={company['company-name']} sx={{ marginBottom: '1rem' }}>
+      {companies.map((company, index) => (
+        <Card key={index} sx={{ marginBottom: '1rem' }}>
           <CardContent>
             <Typography variant="h5">
               {company['company-name']}
             </Typography>
@@ -23,10 +24,10 @@
               Founders: {company['founder-names'].join(', ')}
             </Typography>
           </CardContent>
           <CardActions>
-            <Button 
-              variant="contained" 
+            <Button
+              variant="contained"
               component={Link}
               to={`/company/${encodeURIComponent(company['company-name'])}`}
             >
               View Details

commits.name: Commit-0
